about_the_game:
TL;DR

So, you don’t care about a lot of text? I’m still fine with that.
You get the golden H.O.R.S.E. logo ingame for your amazing support 💖.
NOTHING more, NOTHING less.

H.O.R.S.E. 1st PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP


Thank you for your support so far; we highly appreciate it 💖.
With this “exclusive” H.O.R.S.E. 1st PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP you can support us even more and help us keep working on this amazing gaming experience.
We decided against some sort of monthly/yearly fee 💸, because we wanted to give you the opportunity to actually fully own the H.O.R.S.E. 1st PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP.

what’s included 👍🐴


  • the golden H.O.R.S.E. logo ingame 👍🐴
  • a thank you message from us to you 💌
  • the option to enable/disable the logo ✅
  • the knowledge that you support us even more 💖

what’s NOT included 👎🐴


Unfortunately we haven’t found a way to add achievements to a DLC exclusively. To make sure that all the awesome folks out there who have bought the Progress Bar Simulator are able to 100% complete the achievements (whether or not they want to buy the DLC), we had to leave the achievements out.
We are really sorry that we aren’t able to give you additional H.O.R.S.E. 1st PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP achievements at the current time :(
Anything else that is not explicitly listed as included is not included.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD A6-9500
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 / AMD Radeon VEGA or similar
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

name: Progress Bar Simulator - H.O.R.S.E. 1st

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD A6-9500
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 / AMD Radeon VEGA or similar
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

reviews:
“This may be the dumbest DLC yet; it puts a decal on the screen; that's all. Rather insulting to consumers.”
0 / ∞ – weasel
short_description: The most amazing DLC ever created is now available for you to buy 👍🐴 H.O.R.S.E. 1st PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP
